ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Very New Player
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Tracy welcome to the world of Everquest!  One thing I highly reccomend (and I m sure you ll all agree with me here) is move the auto-attack button. I use
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Tracy welcome to the world of Everquest!  One thing I highly reccomend (and I'm sure you'll all agree with me here) is move the auto-attack button.  I use the ` key since there is little chance that you'll hit it by mistake.  I also suggest going to any PC gaming store and getting the Everquest Guide (the Kunark version since it's more in depth and focused on newbies).  The game is very confusing at first but after several hours you get the hang of the game, the lingo, and whats looked down upon/whats highly accepted.  After reading the guide you'll have an idea of whats going on the game..and what people are saying, you'll hear things like, "Can I get a SoW?  Lvl 12 pally LFG.  TRAIN!"  those type of things heh heh.  Well Tracy have fun learning and getting around in the world of Norrath - Happy Hunting!
 
Dabruiser Troll
Warrior of the 29th Season
-----Original Message-----
From: Tracy [mailto:MistressBeautyful@...]
Sent: Tuesday, September 02, 2003 3:27 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Very New Player

Hello,

My husband just bought me the EverQuest Evolution today and I have
installed it and it looks wonderful but I am having a devil of a
time trying to figure any of it out.  Are there any sites on the web
that can help me learn the aspects of this game?  I just keep
walking around in circles looking at people.

Tracy~Liladadere




Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
